titles: A discourse concerning Puritans. A vindication of those, who uniustly suffer by the mistake, abuse, and misapplication of that name. A tract necessary and usefull for these times.
author: Ley, John, 1583-1662, attributed name.
Parker, Henry, 1604-1652, attributed name.
notes: Variously attributed to Henry Parker and John Ley.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "by Henry Parker a cou[n]sellor".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Dissenters, Religious --  England --  Early works to 1800.
